full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Announcement Details

* **Title (French/English)**: F1700-230331 – DFO – Phase 1 Washroom Renovation Project / F1700-230331 – MPO – Phase 1 Rénovations de toilettes
* **Reference Number**: WS4318610857-Doc4318705135
* **Amendment Number**: 0
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4318610857
* **Publication Date**: November 21, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 6, 2023 at 14:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: November 21, 2023

### Contract Details

* **Expected Contract Start Date**: January 2, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 26, 2024
* **Location**: Victoria, British Columbia

### Tender Status

* **Status (French/English)**: Cancelled / Annulé

### Service Requirements

* **Services Required**: Specialized public building construction services and plumbing construction services

### Contracting Entity Information

* **Contracting Entity (French/English)**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) / Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

### Contact Information

* **Contact Person**: Bryan, Kelly (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: kelly.bryan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Phone**: [Not Available]
* **Fax**: [Not Available]

### Notice URL

* **Notice URL (French/English)**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18069005?extsite=MTgwNjkwMDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Tender Description

Canada has a requirement for the selective demolition of existing men and women washrooms and first aid room on the main level of the building and construction of new washrooms, including:

* Women's washrooms
* Women's showers
* Accessible gender-neutral washrooms
* Accessible gender-neutral showers
* Gender-neutral washrooms

Please note that this tender has been cancelled. No further action is required. However, if you have any questions or
